SecParis Meetup

First Meetup: 15th of December!

The first Meetup will take place the 15th of December, between 7PM and 10PM (local time).

Dashlane will welcome us in their offices, located at the 21 Rue Pierre Picard, 75018 Paris. The nearest metro station is Barbès-Rochechouart (lines 2 and 4).

The call for presentations is OPEN!

Just drop me a line at thomas@chauchefoin.fr or open a pull request against this repository by adding a file in the ./talks folder (follow the example.md file).

We don’t have any talk proposed at the moment.

Sponsors

Dashlane is providing access to their meeting room (capacity 50 people) and some pizzas and drinks: thanks to them!
